description: Active Ways and Means Democrat seeks experienced Legislative Assistant to handle Healthcare and Social Security portfolios. The Legislative Assistant will be responsible for developing legislative initiatives, staffing the Member for hearings and mark-ups, and meeting with constituents and interested groups on behalf of the Member.
responsibilities: Staffing the Member for hearings and mark-ups
Meeting with constituents and interested groups on behalf of the Member
qualifications: A strong understanding of the healthcare universe
Ability to work well with a team in a small, fast-paced environment
how_to_apply: To apply, please submit a resume and cover letter to HealthLA2014@gmail.com. No calls or drop-ins, please.

description:
Senior, Progressive, Democratic Member has an opening for a paid Legislative Fellow to assist the legislative staff with education, women, tax, immigration, and veterans’ issues. This is not an entry-level opportunity.

Ideal candidates are strong writers, with the ability to learn quickly, multi-task, and work independently in a fluid environment. In particular, applicants with great interpersonal skills and good humor are welcome. Women and minorities are encouraged to apply.
responsibilities: Assist the legislative staff with education, women, tax, immigration, and veterans’ issues.
qualifications: Ability to work independently in a fluid environment
how_to_apply: Please email a cover letter and resume to leg.job@mail.house.gov. Applicants should be available to begin work immediately; no phone calls, faxes, or drop-ins, please.
equal_opportunity: Women and minorities are encouraged to apply.
